Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client used by org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.client 
    Class and Description
    AsyncLogger
    Interface for a remote log which is only communicated with asynchronously.
    AsyncLogger.Factory 
    AsyncLoggerSet
    Wrapper around a set of Loggers, taking care of fanning out calls to the underlying loggers and constructing corresponding QuorumCall instances.
    IPCLoggerChannel
    Channel to a remote JournalNode using Hadoop IPC.
    IPCLoggerChannelMetrics
    The metrics for a journal from the writer's perspective.
    LoggerTooFarBehindException 
    QuorumCall
    Represents a set of calls for which a quorum of results is needed.
    QuorumException
    Exception thrown when too many exceptions occur while gathering responses to a quorum call.
    SegmentRecoveryComparator
    Compares responses to the prepareRecovery RPC.
